body.name: Security Camera Outdoor 2K 4MP, Hosafe WiFi Home Security System Video Surveillance IP Camera, Floodlight Motion Detection, Pan Tilt Auto Tracking, Two Way Audio, Color Night Vision, Waterproof
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 3 hrs 11 mins
features: AI motion detection, pan tilt auto tracking: Hosafe smart home security camera is built in intelligent AI algorithm, which could only be triggered by human motion, avoid false alerts from waving leaves, flies, dust, light changing, etc. Once this wireless security camera detects a human motion, it will track the motion target until it is out of view, and it will restore to the default position later.

Once this outdoor WiFi camera detects motions, it will push alert messages to the phone app in no time, you can always check what is happening, built-in 2-way audio allows you to talk with visitors. This wireless IP camera will also record all events to the SD card(insert a card first), you can easily playback recordings from the phone app to check what happened, and download the videos to your phone as proof.

Real Full HD 2K 4MP resolution, stunning clear picture in the day and night, for infrared mode, it is bright black/white night vision, for spotlight mode, it is color night vision, you can use the spotlight as a porch light or scaring the intruders.

HOSAFE outdoor security camera is IP66 waterproof, which could work in all-weather (rainy, snowy, and hot summer), work with all-platform (iPhone, iPad, Android phone and pad, Windows pc and Mac)), and work with most ONIVIF NVR/software (blue iris, iSpy, tiny cam, ipcam viewer), QNAP, Synology, etc.

Truly Risk-free Purchase: Except for Amazon's basic 30-day free return, HOSAFE team offers an extra 1-year free return/replacement service which promises your no-risk purchase, and offers all products lifetime support. If you choose Hosafe outdoor wifi security cameras for home security, our professional technical experts will provide 24/7 service beyond your expectations.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HOSAFE Outdoor security camera, wireless WiFi home security camera with floodlight/spotlight, auto-tracking motion human, motion detection and push notifications to phone, support 2-way talk, easily check, playback and download recordings from micro SD card. (sd card is not included, need to insert a micro sd card first) Upgraded REAL 2K 4MP resolution for more clear pictures in day and night. Upgraded 2.4Ghz & 5Ghz WiFi module supports further and more stable connection. Upgraded 9.8ft power adaptor cable for easier installation. Optional High-Quality DC power extension cord (not included) ASIN: B09DP1VQ4J, make sure the camera works under standard voltage.

Human AI motion detection and auto tracking Based on the latest AI algorithm for human motion detection, this smart home security camera could detect all motion events and be triggered only by a humanoid target, which could avoid most false motion alerts(waving leaves, flying, dust, light change, etc.).When the outdoor security camera detects a human motion, it will focus and follow the moving person to turn, making sure the guy is always in the picture. (the outdoor camera will restore to default position to monitor the most important area after the person is gone ) Spotlight and siren warning, scare the intruders A good security camera system should not only record and send alerts to the owner but should also remind deter the defender and stop crimes. When the intruder triggers the camera motion sensor, the spotlight will be ON, the intruder will be covered by bright light, and the siren will warn as police, normally, the intruders will run away ASAP, because they do not like to be covered by light always. Two way talk with visitors wherever you are Everyone hopes to keep one eye on the home when they are outside, this home security camera could do what you want, when there is a visitor coming, it will be triggered and send an alert message to your phone, then you can easily check the real-time status on your phone app "Camhipro", and talk with the visitor/courier.

24x7 record to SD card, easily playback from phone HOSAFE WiFi camera supports up to 128G Micro SD card to record, it will record 24/7 once inserted a card, save a video per 10min, and the latest video will cover the oldest video, this is a traditionary way for home security system, which can record everything 24/7(it also allows you to record motion events only). Wherever you are, you can easily playback and download the recordings from the phone app easily, all event recordings are marked with special colors which can be found to check quickly. Remotely control PTZ camera HOSAFE remote home security camera allows you to control Pan(355) Tilt(90) Zoom(4x digital zoom) from the phone app, which could easily check the home status. IP66 outdoor security camera HOSAFE indoor/outdoor security camera can work in all-weather (Sunny, Rainy, Snowy), so it is a good choice for outdoor security camera.

ONVIF IP camera for home secuirty system This outdoor camera is a standard Onvif IP camera that supports Onvif protocol, it could work with most Onvif devices/software. ONVIF NVR (1080P or higher), ONVIF software (Blue Iris, iSpy, Tinycam, Ipcam Viewer, etc.), NAS (Synology, Qnap), but they can only watch/record live video/audio, for advanced functions, have to use HOSAFE App/software. Working on all-platform: phone/tablet/PC HOSAFE outdoor camera wireless is a strong function camera that can work on all platforms (iPhone, iPad, android phone, pad, Windows PC, Mac), we offer free app and software to manage many cameras at the same time. The phone app supports 4 camera quad-view at the same time, PC software supports up to 64 views at the same time. Sharing the camera with families easily Once the camera is installed, you can easily share the camera with your families, allow them to receive alerts and check the camrea online, just go to the camera setting page on the phone app, tap the share icon to get a QR code, then install the Camhipro app on another phone, tap + icon to add sharing camera, then scan the QR code to add the camera.

Color night vision home security camera Real Full HD 2K 4MP resolution, stunning clear picture in the day and night, for infrared mode, it is bright black/white night vision, for spotlight mode, it is color night vision, recording everything with its original color like daytime. VERY IMPORTANT FAQS: Q: Is this a complete wireless camera? A: No, it is a wifi camera, has to plug-in power adaptor always. Q: Why does it have to connect to power adaptor？ A: Because this home security camera can record 24/7, then it should be powered always, other 100% wireless camera can only record motion events, may lost some events when it is not triggered. Q: Can I extend the power cable between camera and power adapter? A: Yes, we offer optional high quality 33ft DC power extension cable for this kind of WiFi Camera now, the asin is "B09DP1VQ4J", or search "HOSAFE power extension cable" on Amazon. This cable can make sure the camera working in a reasonable volt, will not damage the camera. Please do not use any other brand power extension cable for this camera, the low quality cable will damage the camera in 3-6 months, please kindly note, thanks.

Usually, the outdoor home security camera can work under a voltage range: 11.4~12.6V, when we add a single 33ft HOSAFE power extension cord, the voltage is from 12V to 11.8V, just drop a little, that will not affect the camera's normal working. When we add too many cables or use low quality cable, the voltage is from 12V to 9.7V, this is out of standard working volt range 11.4~12.6V, this may work in the daytime (IR led not work), but you can find the night vision is not bright/clear enough, and the camera will die in 3-6 months. So please make sure the volt output is in the device's working range, do not damage the expensive device with a cheap power cord.

WiFi Security Camera Outdoor 33ft Power Extensioin Cable for Security Camera Item 1080P Plug-in WiFi Camera Working with power adaptor for security camera, nvr, dvr, poe switch, router, etc. Connector size 5.5x2.1mm 5.5x2.1mm Cost 49.99/pc 20% OFF when buy with this camera together Color White White

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Camera and features for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is one of several Hosafe cameras I have in use at my home and business. Hosafe customer service has always been excellent and quick to respond. That said, this latest and newest camera they are offering is a good value for the price.The many features are very appealing, but their execution needs some development. More on that later. First, when taken out of the well packed box I was surprised that the camera is very light and made of mostly plastic (assume the UV rays of South Florida don’t deteriorate the material as some plastics in the sun) and lighter weight to install. While the large dongle of wires (mostly the RJ 45 LAN connector) that usually are protruding out the bottom of the mounting base, this wire bundle exits out of the side of the base making wire management a bit more tricky if you want to hide them and protect their connection points. With the quicker set up on these newer cameras not requiring a hard wire to the router initially, I think the RJ 45 connector could be eliminated assuming you are only going to use the wifi connection which in reality is why you buy a “wifi” camera! That would eliminate the need to drill a ½ or larger hole to run those wires. As I have with the past 3 installations, I choose to mount my cameras on an outdoor plastic electrical box to terminate the wires and ease of attachment to the building. But this time instead of a large hole in the box cover under the base of the camera, I had to route the wire into the side of the box as shown in the photo. A bit tricky to keep it weather tight with a grommet.Now the features: The LED light source that comes on with motion is pretty bright and a welcome addition to illuminating the subject area and obtaining full color pictures at night. There is also an audible alarm but I am not using that for a good reason… the sensitivity of motion adjustment is adjustable but even at the lowest setting in the app, it is triggered with least bit of wind movement and even insects at night. So, the light is triggered often (that is ok with me) and that alarm would be a nuisance. The same problem comes into play with the other cool feature; motion tracking of the pan and tilt mechanism. Great feature and as stated, not real quick for fast moving objects but with the ultra-sensitive motion detection, it moves much too frequently. Also the range is pretty limited so as the subject moves out of the range (about 10 meters) the camera returns “home” and the subject is now out of the picture. Again, a great feature, but a bit of a delay upon motion ending and much broader sensitivity setting would be big improvement on these new features.Overall, the image is very clear and adequate resolution. Night vision (without the LED light on) is very good as expected. Wifi with the dual antenna is about average for me. I am only getting 60% on an outside, side wall about 15 meters line of site (through the house). My other cameras on the front side which are about half the distance are 100% signal strength with only 1 antenna. Your results may be better as there are many variables controlling wifi strength from inside to outside.The other great feature and the main selling point for me is you not only can use an SD card for image and video capture, but it is also ONVIF compatible to use the many camera security monitoring programs like Blue Iris and others. I am still experimenting with camera control on Blue Iris as it is registering with “generic” camera and all the features do not seem to be accessible so far.Lastly, the two-way audio works well and is another great feature for an inexpensive camera like this. I would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking for a PTZ, dual band that is Onvif that wouldn’t break my budget. This camera fit perfectly! So much so that I bought a 2nd one a week later. Very easy to set up & connect to both Camhi & Blue Iris. The picture is very clear, day & night. The PTZ has some lag, but that’s pretty much expected with IP cams. I love that the cord plugs directly into the back, so there are no plugs (Ethernet, power, reset that most IP cams have) hanging down. Installation was a breeze because the back plate is separate & is attached first & then you just slide in the camera base & secure with 2 screws. Took me maybe 10 minutes to program & mount the camera. The one thing I would suggest is that if you’re using this outdoors that’s it either under a porch or overhang or some type of cover. The housing is completely plastic, so not sure how well it would hold up to rain, snow if is out in the open. For the price, it’s a steal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good overall product. and some of it is US based.
reviews.reviewText: so the good. the camera is easy to setup and install. has good range for the wifi connection ( but my router is not the average router ether). great picture. and has lots of features that other cameras don't have. playing with ISpy. this camera is not in the ispy directory but using a generic setup in ispy can get the camera to do the basics but not able to do everything the camera is capable of. this camera runs off of 12v and for me that is a great thing. No this camera is not able to run off of battery. but for me this is a none issue because i know how to put a battery in line. and the fact that it is 12v not 5v or some other form factor means i don't have to build a transformer to put the battery in line. now the bad. it does not currently work with alexa or google. but there website states they are working on this. as many features as this camera is able to preform and can't get those features to work in ispy or blue iris or that this camera is not directly supported by ether platform is kind of a let down. but i understand these are third party programs to the camera and hosafe probably has no say in it. now the ugly. the cables to run the camera are only able to go out one side of the base of the camera. and the reset button is easily gotten to as it is out there with the power cable and the ether cable. the reset button does have a weather cover on it where as the power and ether connection do not. i don't like that the reset button is that easily gotten to by joe blow walking by. so to fix this i will be putting some heat shrink on it to try and make it hard to get it. as stated before the ether port does not have a weather guard on it and does not look like it is sealed inside to protect against the elements. again heat shrink can fix this. the power connection looks like it will seal ok with the power cable that was provided but does not seal completely. now this should not be a big problem as the negative connection is on the outside of the barrel connector and should not arc. but the connection is not hidden and again is easily gotten to by someone that wants to unplug it and again i'm going to sure some heat shrink around the connection to help protect it and to help deture someone from just coming by and unplugging it. and the last thing that i can put in the ugly section, the length of the power cable that comes with the camera. from wall wart to connector is less than 3 feet. and that is counting the wall wart of the connector. for average joe this could be a show stopper because that does not even reach across my little computer desk. so that is a lot of ext cord to run around outside to get tripped up in and have to try and protect from the weather so something does not spark catch fire. now if you not the average joe the power cable can be spliced and extended safely if you know what your doing. 18-20 gauge outdoor speaker wire, solder and heat shrink will work wonders. and the wires in the supplied cable are color coded run next to each over instead of a hot center and negative shield format.

I recently bought the camera and below are my observations:Pros:- Fast delivery and easy setup;- Image quality is good during the day and night alike. The night vision feature is useful and provides image in color with the help of the floodlights. Those could add extra security for people living in remote and unlit areas;- Fast and easy installation of the apps on both smartphone and computer;- I like interface of the both apps very much.There are some things that could be improved though, as follows:Cons:- Very short power adapter cable. I had to buy an extension cable in addition to the camera;- Even though OVNIF feature is great, the instructions are not clear on how to configure the 3d party app to be able to display camera image.I still recommend the camera, because in my view, the pros outweigh the cons. By the way, the customer service is swift and helpful.

reviews.reviewTitle: Loved the first one, so I bought a second one.
reviews.reviewText: Ok, I bought one of these cameras with low expectations. Let's face it, they are inexpensive, BUT, they aren't cheap. I expected it to die when the temps hit -40C/F, but it kept on working. So I bought another one. Same thing, Worked Perfectly....until I switched providers. When I switched to Starlink, I had to remove and re-install the cameras without an ethernet cable (Starlink doesn't use ethernet cables). I had no idea how to even guess at fixing this, so I contacted customer service. WOW! Step by Step all the way!!!! All the questions were answered!!! The clarity on these cameras is stellar. Tracking someone is Excellent. And for an added bonus, I love the fact that I can talk to people from 100 ft (Yeah, I did measure it 105ft using a range finder) when using the intercom features. My only complaint, and I mean ONLY complaint is that it is white and my neighbors can see it from 100yards away, contrasted against my log home. I see a nice solar camera is available, and will probably try that out as well. GREAT PRODUCT, GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!

I just purchased this camera for install in a horse barn, the barn has WiFi access and the WiFi is connected to the internet.The camera itself is as expected plastic, seems light duty and is a good size fairly small for what it is, it can be placed discretely.The image quality is great when set to “HD”, the intelligent night vision with combination IR and white visible light works very well, With auto motion tracking enabled (disabled by default) I can enter the barn at night, it tracks me and turns the visible flood led lights on and I can easily see to the light switch for the barn! It does what I wanted it to do.The only downside or negative I have is that it was very difficult to get it to connect to my WiFi AND come “online” so I could check by my cell phone.WiFi and internet work fine, signal strength was a bit low where I installed the camera at 60% (as per camera app) it took multiple multiple setup attempts to get it to finally work about 30 tries at resetting and re connecting then eventually one time it came online, I did the same exact procedure every time!In every case I was able to initially connect to the camera directly through its internal WiFi AP (WiFi hotspot) set up the camera then when telling it to switch to the barn WiFi network the camera would connect and sing its connection song, my phone would switch over to the barn network but the camera would remain “offline” in the camera app.I did this over and over and I was just about to return it tried one last time and it worked, in every case when the camera app showed the above I checked my cell phone WiFi access and had no issues checking the internet over WiFiThat all said now it works great and as it should I can check over my cell network the camera, it notifies me of movement, can review footage all remotely, if I go to the barn I can connect to the barn WiFi and do the same alsoThe instructions are not the greatest but if you want to save a ton of money and have time to fiddle this is the camera for you! My friend spent $90 on his barn camera and this one has more features, same image quality, the only difference is his did connect initially easier

Lot of feature, easy connection to router and phone app. Easy connection to NAS and FTP storage. Note that the motion detection feature is not compatible with Synology Surveillance Station. The two bottom screws are practically inaccessible to tighten.Update after using two cameras for a couple of weeks and replacing both of them:The app has serious shortcomings:1. It has a button "preset positions". Don't touch it! As I was explained later by tech support, this camera does not support several preset positions. This is not written anywhere, though. If you try to set preset positions, the camera return to home position after tracking will become erratic: t may go to any position, including facing the wall. That was what I did, and that was what happened. Tech support tried to fix it afterwords, without much of success. That was the reason for replacing both cameras.2. There is an option of checking for new a FW. According to Tech support, don't try this as well. So why the option there, then?Generally, the tracking is good, but the return to home is not very reliable (even if you don't mess with the preset positions). Although rarely, the camera will freeze at the end point of the tracking.The Windows application, which BTW is free share, is slow and for some reason will use only the secondary, Low resolution stream. Any attempt to switch to main stream will not work.UPDATE: Down to one star :( After roughly a month of using, one of the cameras started issuing false alerts, one after the other, only in the night. Practically, this makes the camera unusable in nighttime. Lowering the sensitivity to 1, does not help. The CS is wortless. It is available 24/7, but cannot resolve simple issues. Maybe they are unresolvable? The so-called "Humanoid alarm" is a joke - every moving thing is "humanoid": crow, squirrel, even a wind-shaken bush.Next step: get rid of Hosafe and change the brand :(
